Natural products and TCMs are rich sources of antiviral compounds, including terpenoids, alkaloids, flavonoids, and polyphenols.
31, 81, 82 In the past two decades, due to ongoing efforts to develop antivirals against SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV infections, multiple small molecules derived from TCMs and natural plants were identified to have significant anti-CoV activity.
1, 83 In the next sections, we summarize the natural inhibitors reported to suppress CoV replication. These inhibitors might be developed into effective antiviral treatments against SARS-CoV-2 and emerging novel CoVs.
